product_name: Sea to Summit Mosquito Pyramid Insect Shield Net - Single
long_description: Ideal for trekking, traveling and wilderness camping, the Sea To Summit Mosquito Pyramid net with Insect Shield provides additional protection against mosquitoes and other bugs.
